fields.description:
dml160 fails for wctme5.7 max libraries and foundation. 

dml119.sql and dcl.sql fail on wctme5.7 max libraries with diffs related to license header stuff.

comments.body:
Resolved by updating the following jvm specific master-canons

Sending        java\testing\org\apache\derbyTesting\functionTests\master\ibm15\dcl.out
Sending        java\testing\org\apache\derbyTesting\functionTests\master\j9_13\dcl.out
Sending        java\testing\org\apache\derbyTesting\functionTests\master\j9_13\dml119.out
Sending        java\testing\org\apache\derbyTesting\functionTests\master\j9_22\dml160.out
Sending        java\testing\org\apache\derbyTesting\functionTests\master\j9_foundation\dml160.out

See: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=rev&revision=476616

Note, that this includes a fix for running lang/dcl.sql with ibm jvm 1.5, which had the same problem.
